name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Calvin GILCHRIST, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Calvin GILCHRIST, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: David L. Pollack, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Mariana Sorensen, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
460 A.2d 752
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Calvin GILCHRIST, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 29, 1983.
Decided May 27, 1983.
David L. Pollack, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Mariana Sorensen, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
